description: This Nottinghamshire village lies about 7 miles north-east of the city of Nottingham in the Gedling district of the county. Local walking highlights include Bestwood Country Park and Mill Lakes Country Park which lie just to the west. There's woodland cycling and walking trails and some scenic lakes here. There's also the neighbouring village of Oxton and Blidworth Woods to explore to the north. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Calverton.
